Hello there. I'm Muhtasham Oblokulov, I design, build, and operate machine learning systems. I also (try to) write and speak about ML systems, engineering, and career. I am also co-founder of [MunichðŸ¥¨NLP](https://munich-nlp.github.io/) and co-orginizer of [PyData Munich](https://www.meetup.com/pydata-munchen).

I'm currently working as a Machine Learning Engineer at [Munich Re Group](https://www.munichre.com/en.html). Previously, I worked at [Alyne](https://mitratech.com/products/alyne/) and [Datamics](https://consulting.datamics.com/).To learn more about me, you can check out my [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/muhtasham/).

I am passionate about applied AI and developing efficient and scalable machine learning systems. I am always eager to explore and solve challenging technical problems. If you would like to connect, please feel free to reach out to me via email.
